topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551b16936368723b28350000#post_551b16936368723b28350000
How much would a G1 Gun Megatron cost now?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551b18916368724b72790000#post_551b18916368724b72790000
an original from the 80's in good shape goes for between 100-1,000
The japanese reissues from a few years ago are more around 70-300 but some of them have orange caps due to more recent toy gun laws

"this":http://www.bigbadtoystore.com/bbts/product.aspx?product=TAK10893&mode=retail is probably the cheapest you're going to find anywhere but it's not the original colors. it's a more realistic black color based on the release from the 70's
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

oh and there's the masterpiece version which wouldn't be cheaper in the slightest and to be honest is kinda janky.

the gold one's purdy tho
